description.zh-cn: 一种特殊的外交官衔，由国家元首或政府首脑指派，不常驻特定国家，负责处理特定外交任务或经营多个国家、区域及国际组织的外交事宜。
description.en: A special diplomatic rank appointed by a head of state or government, not permanently assigned to a specific country, responsible for handling specific diplomatic tasks or managing diplomatic affairs with multiple countries, regions, and international organizations.

description.zh-cn: 美国第44任总统，曾任命多位无任所大使处理特定全球议题。
description.en: The 44th President of the United States, who appointed several ambassadors-at-large to handle specific global issues.

description.zh-cn: 美国外交官，由奥巴马总统任命为首位全球妇女议题无任所大使。
description.en: American diplomat, appointed by President Obama as the first Ambassador-at-Large for Global Women's Issues.

description.zh-cn: 美国外交官，由奥巴马总统任命为监控及打击人口贩运问题的无任所大使。
description.en: American diplomat, appointed by President Obama as the Ambassador-at-Large to Monitor and Combat Trafficking in Persons.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国第8、9任总统，在其任内开始实施无任所大使制度。
description.en: The 8th and 9th President of the Republic of China, who initiated the Ambassador-at-Large system during his tenure.

description.zh-cn: 台湾法学家，曾被李登辉总统聘任为无任所大使。
description.en: Taiwanese jurist, was appointed as an Ambassador-at-Large by President Lee Teng-hui.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国外交官，曾被李登辉总统聘任为无任所大使。
description.en: Republic of China diplomat, was appointed as an Ambassador-at-Large by President Lee Teng-hui.

description.zh-cn: 台湾企业家，曾被李登辉总统聘任为无任所大使。
description.en: Taiwanese businessman, was appointed as an Ambassador-at-Large by President Lee Teng-hui.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的最高立法机关。
description.en: The highest legislative body of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国总统马英九的执政时期。该时期未聘任无任所大使。
description.en: The period of Ma Ying-jeou's presidency of the Republic of China. No ambassadors-at-large were appointed during this time.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国第14、15任总统，在其任内恢复聘任无任所大使。
description.en: The 14th and 15th President of the Republic of China, who resumed the appointment of ambassadors-at-large during her tenure.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国第16任总统，延续聘任无任所大使的制度。
description.en: The 16th President of the Republic of China, who continued the policy of appointing ambassadors-at-large.

description.zh-cn: 台湾学者及官员，国立阳明大学前校长，曾任卫生福利部顾问，被蔡英文总统聘任为无任所大使。
description.en: Taiwanese scholar and official, former president of National Yang-Ming University, served as an advisor to the Ministry of Health and Welfare, appointed as an Ambassador-at-Large by President Tsai Ing-wen.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台北市的国立大学，现已合并为国立阳明交通大学。
description.en: A national university in Taipei, Taiwan, now merged into National Yang Ming Chiao Tung University.

en: Ministry of Health and Welfare (Republic of China)

description.zh-cn: 中华民国掌管卫生与社会福利事务的最高主管机关。
description.en: The highest authority in the Republic of China responsible for health and social welfare affairs.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，现任台湾永续能源研究基金会董事长，曾任外交部长及交通部长，被蔡英文及赖清德总统聘任为无任所大使。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, current chairman of the Taiwan Institute for Sustainable Energy, former Minister of Foreign Affairs and Minister of Transportation, appointed as an Ambassador-at-Large by Presidents Tsai Ing-wen and Lai Ching-te.

nodes.id: 台湾永续能源研究基金会

zh-cn: 台湾永续能源研究基金会

en: Ministry of Foreign Affairs (Republic of China)

description.zh-cn: 中华民国掌管外交事务的最高主管机关。
description.en: The highest authority in the Republic of China responsible for foreign affairs.

en: Ministry of Transportation and Communications (Republic of China)

description.zh-cn: 中华民国掌管交通事务的最高主管机关。
description.en: The highest authority in the Republic of China responsible for transportation and communications affairs.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，前行政院环境保护署署长，被蔡英文总统聘任为无任所大使。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, former head of the Environmental Protection Administration, appointed as an Ambassador-at-Large by President Tsai Ing-wen.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国掌管环境保护事务的最高主管机关，现已升格为环境部。
description.en: The highest authority in the Republic of China responsible for environmental protection affairs, now upgraded to the Ministry of Environment.

description.zh-cn: 台湾网络界人士，蕃薯藤创办人，曾任中华电信独立董事，被蔡英文及赖清德总统聘任为无任所大使。
description.en: Taiwanese internet entrepreneur, founder of yam.com, former independent director of Chunghwa Telecom, appointed as an Ambassador-at-Large by Presidents Tsai Ing-wen and Lai Ching-te.

description.zh-cn: 台湾最大的电信服务业者。
description.en: The largest telecommunications service provider in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 台湾作家、企业家，PChome董事长，被蔡英文总统聘任为无任所大使。
description.en: Taiwanese writer and entrepreneur, chairman of PChome, appointed as an Ambassador-at-Large by President Tsai Ing-wen.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的电子商务集团。
description.en: An e-commerce group in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物、学者，时任民进党籍立法委员、国立台湾大学副教授、社会民主党召集人，被蔡英文总统聘任为无任所大使。
description.en: Taiwanese politician and scholar, then a DPP legislator, associate professor at National Taiwan University, and convener of the Social Democratic Party, appointed as an Ambassador-at-Large by President Tsai Ing-wen.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的主要政党之一。
description.en: One of the major political parties in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台北市的国立大学。
description.en: A national university in Taipei, Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的政党。
description.en: A political party in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 台湾田径运动员与政治人物，曾任国策顾问，被蔡英文总统聘任为无任所大使。
description.en: Taiwanese track and field athlete and politician, former National Policy Advisor, appointed as an Ambassador-at-Large by President Tsai Ing-wen.

nodes.id: 中华民国总统府国策顾问

zh-cn: 中华民国总统府国策顾问
en: National Policy Advisor to the President of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国总统府的无给职荣誉职位，由总统遴聘。
description.en: An unpaid honorary position in the Office of the President of the Republic of China, appointed by the President.

description.zh-cn: 台湾民主基金会副执行长，被蔡英文总统聘任为无任所大使。
description.en: Deputy CEO of the Taiwan Foundation for Democracy, appointed as an Ambassador-at-Large by President Tsai Ing-wen.

description.zh-cn: 台湾医师，新国民医院院长，曾任台湾医学会监事、医师公会全国联合会理事长，被蔡英文及赖清德总统聘任为无任所大使。
description.en: Taiwanese physician, president of Hsin Kuo Min Hospital, former supervisor of the Formosan Medical Association, former president of the Taiwan Medical Association, appointed as an Ambassador-at-Large by Presidents Tsai Ing-wen and Lai Ching-te.

description.zh-cn: 台湾原住民牧师，长老教会牧师，前玉山神学院院长，被蔡英文及赖清德总统聘任为无任所大使。
description.en: Taiwanese indigenous pastor of the Presbyterian Church, former president of Yu-Shan Theological College and Seminary, appointed as an Ambassador-at-Large by Presidents Tsai Ing-wen and Lai Ching-te.

description.zh-cn: 台湾政治人物，时任总统府秘书长，曾任台中市市长、交通部部长，被蔡英文总统聘任为无任所大使。
description.en: Taiwanese politician, then Secretary-General to the President, former Mayor of Taichung and Minister of Transportation, appointed as an Ambassador-at-Large by President Tsai Ing-wen.

nodes.id: 中华民国总统府秘书长

zh-cn: 中华民国总统府秘书长
en: Secretary-General to the President of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国总统府的幕僚长。
description.en: The chief of staff of the Office of the President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 台湾台中市的最高行政首长。
description.en: The chief executive of Taichung City, Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 台湾羽球国手，被赖清德总统聘任为无任所大使。
description.en: Taiwanese national badminton player, appointed as an Ambassador-at-Large by President Lai Ching-te.

description.zh-cn: 台湾电脑程式设计师及政治人物，曾任数位发展部部长，被赖清德总统聘任为无任所大使。
description.en: Taiwanese computer programmer and politician, former Minister of Digital Affairs, appointed as an Ambassador-at-Large by President Lai Ching-te.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国掌管数位发展事务的最高主管机关。
description.en: The highest authority in the Republic of China responsible for digital development affairs.

description.zh-cn: 台湾牧师，被赖清德总统聘任为无任所大使。
description.en: Taiwanese pastor, appointed as an Ambassador-at-Large by President Lai Ching-te.

description.zh-cn: 一贯道宝光玉山组线领导人，被赖清德总统聘任为无任所大使。
description.en: Leader of the Baoguang Yushan branch of I-Kuan Tao, appointed as an Ambassador-at-Large by President Lai Ching-te.

description.zh-cn: 发源于中国的宗教。
description.en: A religion that originated in China.

description.zh-cn: 台湾企业家，奇美食品董事长，被赖清德总统聘任为无任所大使。
description.en: Taiwanese businessman, chairman of Chi Mei Foods, appointed as an Ambassador-at-Large by President Lai Ching-te.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的石化及食品公司。
description.en: A petrochemical and food company in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 台湾国际棒球女裁判，被赖清德总统聘任为无任所大使。
description.en: Taiwanese international female baseball umpire, appointed as an Ambassador-at-Large by President Lai Ching-te.

description.zh-cn: 台湾医师与政治人物，曾任无任所大使。
